name: Atomiclick
description:
Prototype of idle / clicker game using my custom game engine based on SDL2.

Well you probably guessed, you click and gain money, you can 'hire' some 'managers' once you reach level 2, they make you gain money passively.
You can decrease time need for managers to make money, increase gain per click.
There is a power related thing, if it goes near 100% you'll gain a lot of money all the time it stay near 100%.

As you can see, it's more or less a simple tech demo, maybe it will get more complex later on but I have not real plan for that.

Should run on every Windows 32bits or 64bits.
